openingStatement.title: Hannah Baker |
openingStatement.subtitle: Software Engineer
openingStatement.description: Hi folks ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to my little corner of the web! I'm Hannah, a trilingual British-Indonesian software engineer based in the beautiful county of West Yorkshire. I'm a Dendrophile (n) A person who loves nature. I also have various hobbies including cooking and baking, playing board games, solo walking and hiking and personal software developement projects mainly in Go, C# .NET, and React. My diverse background and skill set empowers me to tackle challenges with agility and precision. Explore my portfolio and let's bring your ideas to life togetherðŸª´

items.description:
Hi, I'm Hannah (she/her/hers), a Software Engineer currently on a career break. I reside in the serene landscapes of West Yorkshire, where I share my home with my partner James and our beloved fur babies, Elsie, Feisty, and Harvey.

My website serves as a digital journal, documenting notable career events, experimental writings on my learning journey, and anything else that piques my interest. I'm deeply passionate about software engineering, board games, and the wonders of nature.
items.title: Hannah Baker

items.description:
As someone living with Autism, I approach life with curiosity and Iâ€™m continuously learning how to make my life work better around it.

Feel free to reach out to me via email by clicking the bitton below or connect with me through any of the social links below. I'm always up for a chat about anything from code to cats!
items.title: Hannah Baker

hireMe.title: Software Development Overview
hireMe.description: I am a Software Engineer with over 7 years of experience focused primarily on back-end development. I am passionate about solving problems, sharing knowledge, and delivering exceptional results for customers. My priority is building clean, reusable software components that are easy to maintain and meet rigorous quality standards. I also aim to enhance team workflows for more efficient delivery over time.

items.name: C# .NET
items.description: Throughout my career, I've dedicated considerable time to mastering C#, employing it extensively in large-scale enterprise projects. It has been my primary focus, allowing me to navigate various industries and environments with finesse, highlighting my advanced capabilities. I am highly skilled at using C# to confidently address complex development challenges.

items.name: Golang
items.description: I've got close to 2 years of solid experience getting my hands dirty with Golang in enterprise settings. From crafting consumer experiences like discounts and vouchers on the consumer facing Deliveroo site, to building internal tools for controlling critical system-wide solutions, I've been in the thick of it. Additionally, within Deliveroo I've chipped in on enhancing sitewide Golang template repositories to make life easier for fellow developers.

items.name: Docker
items.description: Docker has been a cornerstone of my career, seamlessly fitting into almost every project I've tackled. With microservice architecture being the norm and containers being widely adopted in modern app development, Docker has become essential. Whether it's configuring CI/CD pipelines or ensuring smooth testing and production deployments, you'll find me regularly working with Docker and Docker Compose files.
